instruction: [INST] Analyze this file to learn MacBook motherboard repair. The 'definitions' section explains key technical terms. The 'threads' section contains real-world repair discussions. Use both sections to understand and learn how to troubleshoot MacBook issues. Posts from username 'larossmann' , 'dukefawks' , and '2informaticos' are posts from trusted experts.[/INST]

definitions.A1425: What is A1425? A1425 is a model number for a 13 inch size MacBook Pro Retina from years Early 2013, Late 2012 with EMC 2672, that may contain one of these boards depending on the year & configuration: 820-3190, 820-3462..

threads.title: <MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER>A1425</MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER> shutdown after 2,3 minutes
threads.message: I tried only board and same story. Can I try something like bios or it is trashed?

threads.title: <MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER>A1425</MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER> shutdown after 2,3 minutes
threads.message: Could be anything. Quite hopeless I'm afraid.
